name: RadiantOne VDS Database Schema
summary: Database schema the defines the structure of a database used by the Radiant One Virtual Directory Server (VDS); may be captured from an existing database using the Database Schema Extractor and can be modified using the Schema Manager within RadiantOne.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

windows.display_name: Radiant Logic RadiantOne Virtual Directory Server

linux.display_name: Radiant Logic RadiantOne Virtual Directory Server
